attributes.action: Scrap unfair car parking charges at NHS hospitals for staff, patients & visitors
attributes.background: NHS hospitals are ripping off patients, staff and visitors by often charging extortionate amounts to park at hospitals. 79% of hospitals charge patients to park, and some have been found to charge up to £500 a week for patients to park there causing unnecessary distress for the sick and vulnerable.

rejection.details:
We cannot accept duplicate petitions. We think this petition is similar to yours: 

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/106374

You might like to sign this petition instead. It is more likely to get more signatures that way.
